General.Name: TrustBIX Inc
General.Description: TrustBIX Inc., together with its subsidiary, ViewTrak Technologies Inc. offers information solutions for agri-food industry in Canada, the United States, and internationally. The company engages in the sale, installation, and support of software and computer systems for auction markets and livestock dealers; software for livestock feedlots; Business InfoXchange; and data capture and carcass grading systems for pork plants. It also offers internet-based applications that provide animal tracking and management, as well as solutions to track, protect, and identify the movement of moveable equipment. The company is based in Edmonton, Canada.
General.Address: 10607 ? 82 Street NW, Edmonton, AB, Canada, T6A 3N2
